title: Riverside Views Now Available! US RUBBER LOFTS(B-106)
description: Do you want the privacy of a home but the convenience of an apartment? Then Butcher Block Mill is perfect for you! Private entry, two stories, plenty of closet space! These newly constructed townhomes offer a new perspective on community living.

These units have modern soft close cabinets, glimmering granite counter tops, and a full size washer and dryer! Cozy up by your very own fireplace and gaze onto the Providence River through your over-sized windows. The original hardwood floors can be found on the top floor of this beautifully remodeled building. Designer paint colors give the townhomes a fresh modern look while retaining the historic feel.

We have incredible amenities too! Work out at our on-site gym or catch some sun on the roof top deck! Having a party? Reserve the community room! Watch the big game in our theater room, or catch it in the game room while shooting pool!

Be close to all of the action at Butcher Block Mill. Atwell’s avenue is blocks away, where great food and friendly faces await you. You’re only a 20 minute walk from downtown where you can catch memorable events like water fire, or go get something cool at the Sunday flea market!

title: Complete Modern Living. US Rubber Lofts(12-401)
description: Providence is home to some of the finest food, shopping and entertainment on the East Coast! It’s also home to ALCO, the newest phase at U.S. Rubber Lofts- a beautifully renovated historic mill with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom pet-friendly apartments that truly capture the chic, urban spirit of our city.

Much of the original architecture was retained in this renovated historic mill, so each apartment has a unique & sophisticated look you’ll be proud to call your own. Exposed wooden beams, brick walls, expansive windows, and impressive vaulted ceilings are just some of the exquisite features that make US Rubber Lofts stand out from the crowd. Each unit has a sleek, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gleaming granite counter tops, as well as convenient extras such as in-unit washer/dryer, individual heating and cooling control and garage parking for ultimate in easy city living.
Our residents also have access to an assortment of convenient on-site amenities:
-Enjoy your favorite sports & movies on the big screen in our theatre room
-Take in the view on our roof top deck
-Warm up by the fire pit and grill out on the patio
-Shoot some pool in the community game room
-Work out right at home in our on-site fitness center, indoor basketball court or putting green

title: It’s Always Saturday at US Rubber Lofts! (12-308)
description: Be one of the first to tour the beautiful, brand new apartments at ALCO- the latest addition to The US Rubber Lofts in Providence! If you’ve been apartment hunting recently, then you know that there are plenty of cookie-cutter options out there- this DEF isn’t one of them! These chic, historic mill lofts are unlike anything else you have seen, with beautifully upgraded  kitchens, exposed brick and beams, soaring ceilings and designer finishes throughout, even a gas fireplace in select units! Convenient extras such as in-unit washer/dryer, individual heating and cooling control and garage parking add to the ease and convenience of life in this upscale urban community.

An assortment of convenient on-site amenities completes the package, including indoor basketball court, community game room, fully-equipped fitness center, state-of-the-art theatre room with big screen tv and cinema-style seating, an indoor putting green and a sunny rooftop deck with panoramic views of Providence.

We offer a variety of 1-4 bedroom/1-2 bath floorplans to choose from, come in and find your perfect space! Stop by for personal tour of this stunning property, and when you’re done take a quick walk to downtown Providence and enjoy a taste of some of the fantastic dining and shopping you’ll have at your fingertips when you live with us at US Rubber!

It’s also home to ALCO, the newest phase at U.S. Rubber Lofts- a beautifully renovated historic mill with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom pet-friendly apartments that truly capture the chic, urban spirit of our city.

title: Warm Up With Our Hot Specials. US Rubber Lofts(12-107)
description: Providence is home to some of the finest food, shopping and entertainment on the East Coast! It’s also home to ALCO, the newest phase at U.S. Rubber Lofts- a beautifully renovated historic mill with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom pet-friendly apartments that truly capture the chic, urban spirit of our city.

Much of the original architecture was retained in this renovated historic mill, so each apartment has a unique & sophisticated look you’ll be proud to call your own. Exposed wooden beams, brick walls, expansive windows, and impressive vaulted ceilings are just some of the exquisite features that make US Rubber Lofts stand out from the crowd. Each unit has a sleek, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gleaming granite counter tops, as well as convenient extras such as in-unit washer/dryer, individual heating and cooling control and garage parking for ultimate in easy city living.
Our residents also have access to an assortment of convenient on-site amenities:
-Enjoy your favorite sports & movies on the big screen in our theatre room
-Take in the view on our roof top deck
-Warm up by the fire pit and grill out on the patio
-Shoot some pool in the community game room
-Work out right at home in our on-site fitness center, indoor basketball court or putting green

description: City living that’s convenient. Located right next to the RIPTA bus line and only a few minutes’ drive to the commuter rail. US Rubber Lofts is a modern renter’s dream. Walking distance to all of the hottest night life on Federal Hill, the West Side is the best side!

Never drag your laundry to the laundry-mat again! Every apartment has its very own washer and dryer. Love to cook? Apartments have tons of granite counter top space and beautiful stainless steel appliances. Select unit have: Fireplaces, original hardwood floors, and even spiral staircases!

Be original, never boring at US Rubber Lofts. Each unit holds a unique history told through the original architecture. Wrought iron metal work, towering ceilings, and remarkable exposed brick. These apartments are unforgettable.
US Rubber Lofts has all of the amenities you didn’t know you needed! Amenities tailored to make your life not only easier, but more enjoyable!

description: Providence is home to some of the finest food, shopping and entertainment on the East Coast! It’s also home to ALCO, the newest phase at U.S. Rubber Lofts- a beautifully renovated historic mill with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom pet-friendly apartments that truly capture the chic, urban spirit of our city.

Much of the original architecture was retained in this renovated historic mill, so each apartment has a unique & sophisticated look you’ll be proud to call your own. Exposed wooden beams, brick walls, expansive windows, and impressive vaulted ceilings are just some of the exquisite features that make US Rubber Lofts stand out from the crowd. Each unit has a sleek, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gleaming granite counter tops, as well as convenient extras such as in-unit washer/dryer, individual heating and cooling control and garage parking for ultimate in easy city living.

-Enjoy your favorite sports & movies on the big screen in our theatre room

title: Celebrate the Savings at US Rubber Lofts!! (A-103)
description: Do you want the privacy of a home but the convenience of an apartment? Then Butcher Block Mill is perfect for you! Private entry, two stories, plenty of closet space! These newly constructed townhomes offer a new perspective on community living.

These units have modern soft close cabinets, glimmering granite counter tops, and a full size washer and dryer! Cozy up by your very own fireplace and gaze onto the Providence River through your over-sized windows. The original hardwood floors can be found on the top floor of this beautifully remodeled building. Designer paint colors give the townhomes a fresh modern look while retaining the historic feel.

We have incredible amenities too! Work out at our on-site gym or catch some sun on the roof top deck! Having a party? Reserve the community room! Watch the big game in our theater room, or catch it in the game room while shooting pool!

Be close to all of the action at Butcher Block Mill. Atwell’s avenue is blocks away, where great food and friendly faces await you. You’re only a 20 minute walk from downtown where you can catch memorable events like water fire, or go get something cool at the Sunday flea market!

title: Modern Living in Historic US Rubber Lofts(B-106)
description: Do you want the privacy of a home but the convenience of an apartment? Then Butcher Block Mill is perfect for you! Private entry, two stories, plenty of closet space! These newly constructed townhomes offer a new perspective on community living.

These units have modern soft close cabinets, glimmering granite counter tops, and a full size washer and dryer! Cozy up by your very own fireplace and gaze onto the Providence River through your over-sized windows. The original hardwood floors can be found on the top floor of this beautifully remodeled building. Designer paint colors give the townhomes a fresh modern look while retaining the historic feel.

We have incredible amenities too! Work out at our on-site gym or catch some sun on the roof top deck! Having a party? Reserve the community room! Watch the big game in our theater room, or catch it in the game room while shooting pool!

Be close to all of the action at Butcher Block Mill. Atwell’s avenue is blocks away, where great food and friendly faces await you. You’re only a 20 minute walk from downtown where you can catch memorable events like water fire, or go get something cool at the Sunday flea market!

These units have modern soft close cabinets, glimmering granite counter tops, and a full size washer and dryer! title: Complete Modern Living. US Rubber Lofts(B-104)
description: Butcher Block Mill, where living in the city can be affordable and spacious! There is no need to sacrifice square footage to live the urban lifestyle. These townhome style lofts offer you a unique opportunity; privacy and undeniable luxury.

Residents at our community enjoy a vast array of amenities and are surrounded with a multitude of entertainment options. Just minutes away from the Federal Hill nightlife, Butcher Block Mill is a prime location for those wanting to take advantage of all that Providence has to offer.

Our units feature vaulted ceilings, original brick work, massive windows, and unique historic touches leftover from times past. The remodeled kitchen brings a modern twist, with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances. Let the sunshine pour in through the huge windows. The views not bad either, these townhomes are located right on the river!

Onsite amenities take your renting experience to a whole new level! We offer a gym, community room, theater room, fire pit area, rooftop deck and a game room! Watch a movie, play to foosball, or grill out, all seconds away from your front door!

title: Dashing Through The Snow To A Brand New Home (12-207)
description: City living that’s convenient. Located right next to the RIPTA bus line and only a few minutes’ drive to the commuter rail. US Rubber Lofts is a modern renter’s dream. Walking distance to all of the hottest night life on Federal Hill, the West Side is the best side!

Never drag your laundry to the laundry-mat again! Every apartment has its very own washer and dryer. Love to cook? Apartments have tons of granite counter top space and beautiful stainless steel appliances. Select unit have: Fireplaces, original hardwood floors, and even spiral staircases!

Be original, never boring at US Rubber Lofts. Each unit holds a unique history told through the original architecture. Wrought iron metal work, towering ceilings, and remarkable exposed brick. These apartments are unforgettable.
US Rubber Lofts has all of the amenities you didn’t know you needed! Amenities tailored to make your life not only easier, but more enjoyable!
•	On-site gym

•	Propane Grill
•	Community room
•	Theater room
•	Wi-fi hot spots

Your 4 legged friends are more than welcome! You can even walk them along the Providence River right next to our property!

title: You always wanted to check us out! WHY WAIT? (309)
description: Providence is home to some of the finest food, shopping and entertainment on the East Coast! It’s also home to ALCO, the newest phase at U.S. Rubber Lofts- a beautifully renovated historic mill with 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom pet-friendly apartments that truly capture the chic, urban spirit of our city.

Much of the original architecture was retained in this renovated historic mill, so each apartment has a unique & sophisticated look you’ll be proud to call your own. Exposed wooden beams, brick walls, expansive windows, and impressive vaulted ceilings are just some of the exquisite features that make US Rubber Lofts stand out from the crowd. Each unit has a sleek, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gleaming granite counter tops, as well as convenient extras such as in-unit washer/dryer, individual heating and cooling control and garage parking for ultimate in easy city living.
Our residents also have access to an assortment of convenient on-site amenities:
-Enjoy your favorite sports & movies on the big screen in our theatre room
-Take in the view on our roof top deck
-Warm up by the fire pit and grill out on the patio
-Shoot some pool in the community game room
-Work out right at home in our on-site fitness center, indoor basketball court or putting green

description: Do you want the privacy of a home but the convenience of an apartment? Then Butcher Block Mill is perfect for you! Private entry, two stories, plenty of closet space! These newly constructed townhomes offer a new perspective on community living.

These units have modern soft close cabinets, glimmering granite counter tops, and a full size washer and dryer! Cozy up by your very own fireplace and gaze onto the Providence River through your over-sized windows. The original hardwood floors can be found on the top floor of this beautifully remodeled building. Designer paint colors give the townhomes a fresh modern look while retaining the historic feel.

We have incredible amenities too! Work out at our on-site gym or catch some sun on the roof top deck! Having a party? Reserve the community room! Watch the big game in our theater room, or catch it in the game room while shooting pool!

title: --- APARTMENT SCAMMERS ---
description: Everyone Please be aware of apartment scammers that are requesting your email  address. They show low rent ,nice Apartments that are obviously not obtainable in this outrageous rental market. Nevertheless they are scammers trying to get to you do not respond do not give your email address to anyone. Also please beware of RENT TO OWN or DEPOSITS UP FRONT without seeing a property. And yes the one and only APPLICATION FEE. They're not all scammers but yes most of them are . you have to pay attention and be diligent. These scammers do not portray Americans .the scammers are people that have to take from our society. shame on them and I'm all about Karma

title: --- APARTMENT SCAMMERS ---
description: Everyone Please be aware of apartment scammers that are requesting your EMAIL ADDRESS.  don't give it out unless you know it's a local realtor or someone you're comfortable or familiar with. They show low rent ,nice Apartments that are obviously not obtainable in this outrageous rental market, also they might ask you to RESERVE your apartment or reserve a bedroom in an apartment.  DON'T SEND MONEY to anyone ahead of time without viewing the property first.  PERIOD . Beware of APPLICATION FEES because SOME people are using those as scams, And also beware of  RENT-TO-OWN , that is another popular scam on Craigslist.

title: Studio Loft | The Plant | Live/Work Space | #11
description: - The Loft -

This loft-style live/work space is massive! Located on the top floor, the over-sized windows let in lots of natural light. A truly open-concept floor plan, the kitchen includes an extended granite breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances, and tons cabinet space.
This loft is zoned for commercial or residential use - turn it into your dream apartment, a unique office for your business, or both!
Additional apartment amenities include:
Water, sewer, trash, and lot parking included in rent!
Dog- & Cat-friendly
Original hardwood floors
High-efficiency gas heat
Cable-ready for either Verizon or Cox
Access to all amenities at Rising Sun Mill one block away: 24/7 fitness center, secure mail room, laundry facilities, and common rooms
- The Building -

The Plant is a unique community where artists converge, neighbors gather, and the community celebrates. A mixed use building, there are tons of things to do in the building's thriving market! Live in one of the beautifully renovated lofts. Grab a drink at RIFFRAFF and a bite to eat at Troop. Train your taste buds at Spirited Grape: Wine & Spirit School. Pamper yourself at Ello Pretty Beauty Salon and Face PVD Lash & Brow Studio. Work up a sweat at Mind 2 Body Pilates. Support your local artists at Hungry Ghost Press & Foolish Bandits' vintage shop.
Building amenities include:
Charming courtyard with multiple hang out spots
In-building laundry facilities
Lobby with elevator
2nd floor community library
2 large parking lots
Gas grill station
- The Neighborhood -

The Plant lies at the intersection of the rapidly revitalizing neighborhoods of Federal Hill, Broadway, and the Armory District on Providence’s West Side. Aside from the many businesses at The Plant, you have RI Yoga's Bikram Studio and The Easy Entertaining Cafe just a block away at the Rising Sun Mills. Quick access to I-95, Route 10, and Route 6, with public transportation easily accessible. Located just minutes from all Providence hospitals.

title: New Construction!! Stunning West End Apartments!! 1-2 bed
description: New construction at its finest! The Upton Residences - a brand new 30-unit luxury apartment building nestled in the desirable West Side of Providence is now leasing! Our elegant and spacious one and two-bedroom apartments are roomier and have nicer finishes than the competition. All the units feature modern kitchens and bathrooms, generous living spaces, large windows and off-street parking, all within a few minutes’ walk of Downtown Providence.

Inside, the well-designed kitchen features stainless steel appliance package with granite counter tops, tile backsplash, dishwasher and microwave with vented hood for all your cooking needs! Open floor plans allow you to furnish freely for your family and friends. Also, you’ll find spacious bedrooms with ample closets, not to mention that each apartment comes with abundant storage space and closets. There are handsome and durable bamboo flooring throughout, except in the bathrooms, which are tile with tile shower surrounds and granite counters. There is a dedicated laundry room on each floor.

This building features super-insulated construction for extreme energy-efficiency, and continuous ventilation for superb indoor air quality. High efficiency heat-pump heating and cooling systems in each room allows you to “set it and forget it” while saving on your monthly utility bill!

As for security, the Upton comes with secure entrances with intercom and remote entry system as well as security cameras throughout. There is secure covered parking on the ground floor (1 FREE SPACE FOR 1 YEAR, IF APPROVED BY 12/31/19) with indoor Bike storage (no charge). In addition, there is elevator access to all 3 floors from the parking areas, and ample exterior parking on site. Also we offer a dedicated secure package area in the lobby.
We welcome your pets in our pet friendly community (pet rent charges will apply/restricted breed list/weight limits).

This walkable community offers delicious restaurants, unique shopping, and plenty of entertainment venues nearby. Also, you’ll find this thriving community offers most conveniences locally yet sits in a warm and welcoming neighborhood. (Not to mention the fabulous new Urban Greens Food Co-op right next door!)
Contact Kate for more information about this incredible opportunity!! Call/TEXT 450-0731 from 8AM-8PM View the floor plans, pricing, and availability on our website at www.Uptonpvd.com.
THIS IS A NON-SMOKING FACILITY.

title: Furnished renovated private apartment with utilities included
description: This first floor private apartment was recently renovated and has everything you need for your stay. It is in a Victorian home built in 1887 in the Armory historic district. In addition to the bedroom and bath, the apartment has a den, a full kitchen and a small butler's pantry. The bedroom is quiet and away from the street. The apartment has central air with heat and A/C . The neighborhood has lots of character and is located close to many amenities and to downtown.
The apartment is located in our home and has its own private entrance, with a sidewalk directly to the off-street parking.

We recently renovated the apartment. It has brand new kitchen cabinets and appliances. If you like to cook, you should be happy with the five burner gas stove, as well as the dishwasher, microwave and full size refrigerator.
The den has a smart TV and you can access any services you may be subscribed to. We offer access to Netflix. The bedroom has a lot of natural light with a window overlooking the yard.
The washer and dryer are easily accessible in the basement at no extra charge and all utilities are included.
The following lease terms are available:
1 year lease: $1250/mo
6 month lease: $1300/mo
3 month lease: $1400/mo
Month to month: $1500/mo
Pets will be considered on a case-by-case basis for a fee.

title: New Construction!! Stunning West End Apartments!! 1-2 bed
description: New construction at its finest! The Upton Residences - a brand new 30-unit luxury apartment building nestled in the desirable West Side of Providence is now leasing! Our elegant and spacious one and two-bedroom apartments are roomier and have nicer finishes than the competition. All the units feature modern kitchens and bathrooms, generous living spaces, large windows and off-street parking, all within a few minutes’ walk of Downtown Providence.

Inside, the well-designed kitchen features stainless steel appliance package with granite counter tops, tile backsplash, dishwasher and microwave with vented hood for all your cooking needs! Open floor plans allow you to furnish freely for your family and friends. Also, you’ll find spacious bedrooms with ample closets, not to mention that each apartment comes with abundant storage space and closets. There are handsome and durable bamboo flooring throughout, except in the bathrooms, which are tile with tile shower surrounds and granite counters. There is a dedicated laundry room on each floor.

This building features super-insulated construction for extreme energy-efficiency, and continuous ventilation for superb indoor air quality. High efficiency heat-pump heating and cooling systems in each room allows you to “set it and forget it” while saving on your monthly utility bill!

As for security, the Upton comes with secure entrances with intercom and remote entry system as well as security cameras throughout. There is secure covered parking on the ground floor (1 FREE SPACE FOR 1 YEAR, IF APPROVED BY 12/31/19) with indoor Bike storage (no charge). In addition, there is elevator access to all 3 floors from the parking areas, and ample exterior parking on site. Also we offer a dedicated secure package area in the lobby.
We welcome your pets in our pet friendly community (pet rent charges will apply/restricted breed list/weight limits).

This walkable community offers delicious restaurants, unique shopping, and plenty of entertainment venues nearby. Also, you’ll find this thriving community offers most conveniences locally yet sits in a warm and welcoming neighborhood. (Not to mention the fabulous new Urban Greens Food Co-op right next door!)
Contact Kate for more information about this incredible opportunity!! Call/TEXT 450-0731 from 8AM-8PM View the floor plans, pricing, and availability on our website at www.Uptonpvd.com.
